      • SmoothNoiseRobust_Horizontal

        public static int[][] SmoothNoiseRobust_Horizontal
        Smooth Noise Robust (Horizontal). This mask use 1/32 conv(mask) as weight. Combines isotropic noise suppression and precise gradient estimation. References: http://www.holoborodko.com/pavel/image-processing/edge-detection/

      • SmoothNoiseRobust_Vertical

        public static int[][] SmoothNoiseRobust_Vertical
        Smooth Noise Robust (Vertical). This mask use 1/32 conv(mask) as weight. Combines isotropic noise suppression and precise gradient estimation. References: http://www.holoborodko.com/pavel/image-processing/edge-detection/
